data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who are far from you in Santa Rosa. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santa Rosa, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Santa Rosa, Guatemala to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Santa Rosa an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Santa Rosa, Guatemala to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people.
Father, convict the 75,234 believers in Santa Rosa to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Santa Rosa that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 301,400 people living in the state of Santa Rosa.
